text: Kari Yli-Renko (born November 17, 1959) is a former offensive lineman who played for four Canadian Football League teams from 1985 to 1993. Previously, he played three years in the United States Football League. He played college football for the Cincinnati Bearcats and was selected by the Cincinnati Bengals of the National Football League in the 1982 NFL Draft. ==References== *Career Stats Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago Blitz players Category:New Jersey Generals players Category:Philadelphia/Baltimore Stars players Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:Calgary Stampeders players Category:Ottawa Rough Riders players Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Canadian football offensive linemen Category:Cincinnati Bearcats football players Category:Players of Canadian football from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Greater Sudbury Category:Canadian players of American football
title: Kari Yli-Renko
